fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource

Class FileCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.playsoft.android.tools.resource.FileCopier

  • public class FileCopier
extends Object
    Tool for copying of large files between internal/external memory.
    Author:
    Olgierd Uzieblo

    • Field Summary

      static String TAG
      Tag for LogCat

        public static final String TAG
        Tag for LogCat

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileCopier

        public FileCopier(Context pContext,
          int pSourceMemoryType,
          String pSourceFileName,
          int pDestinationMemoryType,
          String pDestinationFileName,
          boolean pDeleteSourceAfterCopy,
          boolean pIsCopyInNewThread,
          IFileCrypter pFileCrypter,
          IFileCopyProgress pCopyProgress)
        Creates new FileCopier.
        Parameters:
        pContext - Context to use.
        pSourceMemoryType - Type of memory for source file.
        pSourceFileName - Source file name.
        pDestinationMemoryType - Type of memory for destination file.
        pDestinationFileName - Destination file name.
        pDeleteSourceAfterCopy - True will delete source file after copy.
        pIsCopyInNewThread - True will launch copying in a new thread.
        pFileCrypter - Optional file crypter to use while copying. Can be null.
        pCopyProgress - Optional progress listener. Can be null.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public boolean copy()
        Copies the file.
        Returns:
        True if copy was successful. If copying is made in a new thread we return true immediately.
